name: Temperature Readings
comments:
Timer inserts a temperature reading and rules insert parent and calculate averages by hour, day, month. Created with a new empty database.
1. Click Data Explorer on the Navigation Menu (to the left)
2. In Data Explorer, enter Author Mode (gear on top right; typical login is Admin...)
3. Create Tables (look for the "+" button in the upper left)
Please see https://docops.ca.com/ca-live-api-creator/4-0/en/creating-apis/database-creation
